entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
